channel.title: Magnumscape source v1 [Works with client well]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg7/ktdude99/logo-2.png[/img]
[size=20pt]Magnumscape source v1[/size] [size=16pt]Works well with client[/size]
[size=18pt]Post/Reply if you like it![/size]
[size=30pt]This source is open for modification[/size]
[size=15pt]Features[/size]
-Works great with silab -Works great with my client -New starting area -Ability to choose classes from these: *Warrior *Mage *Archer *Pure *Skiller -[u]Custom WORKING god wars with two teams Zamorak and Saradomin who can pk during the game while killing the gods then you use your prize key at the end with the chest to get your god sword pieces one game at a time [/u] -Source meant for hardcore PK -Tons of shops -Make member feature -Skill capes with custom emotes -Get skill capes when you reach 99! -Custom slayer missions and quests to get xp! -Highscore system -a "View stats" system -All spells work! -All god items added (god swords, bandos, armadyl, etc...) -Most spec. attacks work except for the god swords -Custom dragon dungeon -Numerous training areas including "click-on xp" and actual combat xp. -Christmas crackers work as well (i know you guys don't care but they do) -Working make over mage so feel free to change your character at any time. -Large mall area -Jad arena fight -Jad drops fire cape and random rare items ranging from dragon items to party hats and masks.
[size=20pt]Pictures Here[/size]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/open.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/classes.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/makeover.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/train.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/train2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/train3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/mission.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/archerhop.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/fishshop.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/foodshop.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/general.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/mageshop.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/wildyshop.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/wantto.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/jad.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/godwars.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo96/magnumscape/pksystem.jpg[/img]
[size=30pt]Remember i'm always up for positive feed back from you guys![/size]
[size=25pt]Download here[/size]
http://filebeam.com/37fdc2968ba14a8b49d9dc13f951c7a4 or http://uppit.com/NTDYI4 or http://www.mediafire.com/?nzoyhjuzztb
[size=15pt]Client[/size]
http://filebeam.com/6907027b892c3e50cd3659b959667cee
**Quick tutorial**
Steps:
1. go into client.java and hit Ctrl+F and you will get a box asking you what you want to find, then type in Magnum.
-example [code]public void loadquestinterface() { sendQuest("@whi@Magnumscape Quests", 640);[/code] You change where ever my name is to what ever your server name is
2. Change NPC chat so they don't yell stuff about magnumscape. Go into npc.java do the same Ctrl+F and search for magnum and change anything with that in it to your server name or your character name!
3.Modifying starting armor. To do this go into player.java abd playerhandler.java and search for the starting armor or starting levels (you can also change the xp rate in here) so then chnage the item id's to what ever you would like them to be for each class.
4.Compiling the server is easy, you just have to know where your jdk (java development kit) is located on your computer. In my compiler my code is like this [code]@echo off COLOR 06 title Magnumscape Compiler "D:\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
Change the path in the compiler to where ever yours is located (ex: C:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe) If you don't change the path (unless yours is located where mine is) than you made those changes for nothing because they don't take affect unless you compile.
5.Play on it and admire your changes!

item.title: Magnumscape source v1 [Works with client well]
item.dc:creator: @ZioBotic ZioBotic
item.description:
@ZioBotic wrote:

what does this have to do with the average butter consumption of a retard?

[quote=“odoat, post:1, topic:250000”]

[size=20pt]Magnumscape source v1[/size]
[size=16pt]Works well with client[/size]

[size=18pt]Post/Reply if you like it![/size]

[size=30pt]This source is open for modification[/size]

[size=15pt]Features[/size]

-Works great with silab
-Works great with my client
-New starting area
-Ability to choose classes from these:
*Warrior
*Mage
*Archer
*Pure
*Skiller
-Custom WORKING god wars with two teams Zamorak and Saradomin who can pk during the game while killing the gods then you use your prize key at the end with the chest to get your god sword pieces one game at a time
-Source meant for hardcore PK
-Tons of shops
-Make member feature
-Skill capes with custom emotes
-Get skill capes when you reach 99!
-Custom slayer missions and quests to get xp!
-Highscore system
-a “View stats” system
-All spells work!
-All god items added (god swords, bandos, armadyl, etc…)
-Most spec. attacks work except for the god swords
-Custom dragon dungeon
-Numerous training areas including “click-on xp” and actual combat xp.
-Christmas crackers work as well (i know you guys don’t care but they do)
-Working make over mage so feel free to change your character at any time.
-Large mall area
-Jad arena fight
-Jad drops fire cape and random rare items ranging from dragon items to party hats and masks.

[size=20pt]Pictures Here[/size]

open.jpg770×548

classes.jpg857×535

train.jpg766×497

train3.jpg770×526

[size=30pt]Remember i’m always up for positive feed back from you guys![/size]

[size=25pt]Download here[/size]

http://filebeam.com/37fdc2968ba14a8b49d9dc13f951c7a4
or
http://uppit.com/NTDYI4
or
http://www.mediafire.com/?nzoyhjuzztb

[size=15pt]Client[/size]

http://filebeam.com/6907027b892c3e50cd3659b959667cee

Quick tutorial

Steps:

  1. go into client.java and hit Ctrl+F and you will get a box asking you what you want to find, then type in Magnum.

-example

public void loadquestinterface() { sendQuest("@whi@Magnumscape Quests", 640);
You change where ever my name is to what ever your server name is

  1. Change NPC chat so they don’t yell stuff about magnumscape. Go into npc.java do the same Ctrl+F and search for magnum and change anything with that in it to your server name or your character name!

3.Modifying starting armor. To do this go into player.java abd playerhandler.java and search for the starting armor or starting levels (you can also change the xp rate in here) so then chnage the item id’s to what ever you would like them to be for each class.

4.Compiling the server is easy, you just have to know where your jdk (java development kit) is located on your computer. In my compiler my code is like this

@echo off COLOR 06 title Magnumscape Compiler "D:\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Change the path in the compiler to where ever yours is located (ex: C:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe) If you don’t change the path (unless yours is located where mine is) than you made those changes for nothing because they don’t take affect unless you compile.

5.Play on it and admire your changes![/quote]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @odoat odoat
item.description:
@odoat wrote:

I’ve had this server for about 2 years now i have released on silab, i’ve released on runetk so maybe some one leached it because i did make this i will show you when it was last modified hold on[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2008, 05:02:02 pm[/size][hr]Here

Check the date of creation, compare to the date that Wildsplay was created[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2008, 05:34:16 pm[/size][hr]Exactly, bulby strife leeched ME!

Read full topic

item.title: Magnumscape source v1 [Works with client well]
item.dc:creator: @Godsent Godsent
item.description:
@Godsent wrote:

This is Wilds Play by Bulby Strife.

[QUOTE=1337hax]God wars can be enabled or disabled, just read the Readme.txt after downloading.

After downloading follow this tutorial here to fix a glitch. http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=51960

Okay this is a Pk server made from my source Trunescape. :woot:

Here are some pics of it.

It has:

All skills(no con hunter or summon)
1 click pickup from ground
Jad Does 3 attacks
most npcs have animations
Godwars(optional)
Starter Selection(optional)
Talking npcs
Nice shops
Slayer Tasks
Real runescape cape triming(optional)
2 Highscores(skiller and normal)
All emots on emotes tab.

File Name: Wilds Play
Download Size: 2.27Mb
Download (if link does not work for you …then tobad…don’t post about it)[/QUOTE]
At least it really really looks like it.

Read full topic
